com.oregonscientific.meep.util
Class ImageDownloader

java.lang.Object
  com.oregonscientific.meep.util.ImageDownloader

public class ImageDownloader
extends Object

Adapted from the Android Developer source code, can be found in: http://code.google.com/p/android-imagedownloader/ or direct link: http://android-imagedownloader.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/com/example/android/imagedownloader/ImageDownloader.java This helper class download images from the Internet and binds those with the provided ImageView.

It requires the INTERNET permission, which should be added to your application's manifest file.

A local cache of downloaded images is maintained internally to improve performance.

Nested Class Summary
(package private)  class ImageDownloader.BitmapDownloaderTask
          The actual AsyncTask that will asynchronously download the image.

          A fake Drawable that will be attached to the imageView while the download is in progress.

Constructor Detail

ImageDownloader

public ImageDownloader(Context context,
                       String uniqueName)
Creates a new instance of ImageDownloader using the given unique name for caching the images

Parameters:
context - The context to use
uniqueName - A unique directory name to append to the cache dir

ImageDownloader

public ImageDownloader(File diskCacheDir)
Method Detail

download

public void download(String url,
                     ImageView imageView)
Download the specified image from the Internet and binds it to the provided ImageView. The binding is immediate if the image is found in the cache and will be done asynchronously otherwise. A null bitmap will be associated to the ImageView if an error occurs.

Parameters:
url - The URL of the image to download.
imageView - The ImageView to bind the downloaded image to.

download

public void download(String url,
                     int maxWidth,
                     int maxHeight,
                     ImageView imageView)

Bitmap downloadBitmap(String url,
                      int maxWidth,

setMode

public void setMode(ImageDownloader.Mode mode)

clearCache

public void clearCache()
Clears the image cache used internally to improve performance. Note that for memory efficiency reasons, the cache will automatically be cleared after a certain inactivity delay.
